ArgonTest.Name: Class field from parameter with temporary
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::*
class MyClass <: Object public new(name: String) let t = name field name = t end
field name: String
public proc self.say_hello(): () do puts 'Hello' puts name end end
proc main(): () do MyClass.new('Bob').say_hello() end
